refnamediv.refpurpose: To get the number of non-zero entries of the constraint matrix of the current problem.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This routine is used to get the number of non-zero entries of the constraint matrix of the current problem.

refsection.title: Return value
refsection.para: If there was an error, it prints error message to Scilab console and returns -1, else it returns a number ( >=0 ) as number of non-zero elements.
